data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Atlántico Norte, Nicaragua.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Atlántico Norte, Nicaragua
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 107,178 believers in the state of Atlántico Norte into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 107,178 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Atlántico Norte access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Atlántico Norte, Nicaragua to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Atlántico Norte, Nicaragua that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Atlántico Norte, Nicaragua.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Atlántico Norte
location.cities_list: Puerto Cabezas, Siuna, Waspán, Bonanza, San José de Bocay
location.cities_list_w_pop: Puerto Cabezas (33,635), Siuna (16,056), Waspán (6,403), Bonanza (6,315), San José de Bocay (2,367)
